prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Guitar, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, and Guitar, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
